titles.title: Removing Barriers to SNAP Act
Removing Barriers to SNAP Act

To amend the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 to repeal provisions relating to the denial of benefits under the supplemental nutrition assistance program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary:
Removing Barriers to SNAP Act
This bill repeals provisions relating to the denial of benefits under the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP, formerly known as the food stamp program) to individuals with certain drug-related convictions.
